DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess fusion status in patients who underwent spinal fusion with Actifuse synthetic bone graft versus other bone graft material (including autograft) in achieving lumbar spinal fusion.
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Study of Actifuse Synthetic Bone Graft Versus Other Bone Graft Substitutes in Patients Requiring Lumbar Fusion
DOC.criteria: Any patient 18 years of age or older Patients with a minimum follow up of 1 year Patients who have previously undergone TLIF, PLIF,PLF, XLIF procedures Patients under the age of 18 Any patient with less than 1 year of follow up history at the time of first data analysis Any patient that the primary investigator deems as an unfit candidate
